events.message: I received my order last week, but the item isn't what I expected and I want to request a refund as soon as possible.
The customer has requested a refund due to dissatisfaction with the received product.
Assigning this refund request to agent Sarah M. for further assistance and follow-up.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I’m here to help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To process your refund, could you also tell me the reason why you want to return the item and its current condition?
My order number is 789654123. The item arrived damaged and is not working, so I definitely want a refund, please.
Thank you for the details. We can initiate the refund immediately once you send back the damaged product using the prepaid return label I will email you shortly.
Thanks, I appreciate the quick response. I will ship the package back today and let you know once it's done.
We have received the returned item and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3 to 5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received your refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Thank you for your patience. We are closing this case now, but please contact us again if you have further questions.
